channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Post - April 8, 2022
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Calendar video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-april-8-2022) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog! This week we've got sessions of these great games:
* _Delta Green_ * _Dungeons & Dragons_ * _Eotenweard_ * _Fall of Magic_ * _Masks_ * _Monsterhearts_ * _Nexus Modern Sorcery_ * _Stars in the Dark_ * _The Sprawl_ * _Voidheart Symphony_ * _World Wide Wrestling_
Thanks go out to all this week's facilitators and players. If you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Calendar category](https://forums.gauntlet-rpg.com/c/gauntlet-calendar) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Calendar](https://gauntletcalendar.com/events) to play!

@flatvurm wrote:
